item.title: Swift Playgrounds 4 release imminent
item.description: Finally seems like the wait is about to get over and soon you will be able to install Swift Playgrounds 4 on your iPads. Apple.com still mentions vague “available late 2021” release date, but you should expect the release within a couple of weeks. Why? Here are some points to back it: Update: Apple released final versions of Xocde 13.2 and iPadOS 15.2 on December 13th, but we haven’t seen any prominent progress regarding Swift Playgrounds 4 yet, except that “Available late 2021” footnote has been removed from iPadOS 15 page.
